r.s: Abstraction of various SASL mechanism responses
r.d: Provides code to generate responses to common SASL mechanisms, including: o Digest-MD5 o CramMD5 o Plain o Anonymous o Login (Pseudo mechanism)
r.n: * Fixed Bug #2143 Auth_SASL_DigestMD5::getResponse() generates invalid response * Fixed Bug #6611 Suppress PHP 5 Notice Errors * Fixed Bug #2154 realm isn't contained in challange
